data.homeworkTitle: 第一章 传染病特征、传染病相关概念 练习

questions.title: 某幼儿园，30多名小朋友，在午餐后出现发热、呕吐、腹泻，集镇护士小欣判断这种情况属于（）
以下哪种疾病是法定甲类传染病
病原体侵入人体后能否引起疾病，主要取决于：
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"机体的保护性免疫","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"病原体的致病力与机体的免疫机能","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"机体的天然屏障作用","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"病原体的毒力与数量","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"病原体的侵入途径与特异性定位","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 感染过程的五种表现在不同疾病中各有侧重，一般最常见的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"病原体被清除","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"隐性感染","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"显性感染","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"潜伏性感染","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"病原携带状态","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病原体侵袭人体后不出现或仅出现不明显的临床症状，但通过免疫学检测可发现对入侵病原体产生了特异性免疫反应，应称为
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"隐性感染","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"健康携带者","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"显性感染","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"潜在性感染","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"不典型感染","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病原体侵入人体后，仅引起机体发生特异性的免疫应答，而不引起或只引起轻微的组织损伤，临床上不显出任何症状、体征与生化改变，只能通过免疫学检查才能发现。此种情况属于：
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"病原体被清除","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"潜伏性感染","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"显性感染","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"病原携带状态","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"隐性感染","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 传染病的基本特征是，除外：
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"有特异病原体","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"有传染性","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"有感染中毒症状","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"有流行病学特征","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"有感染后免疫","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 急性传染病的发生、发展和转归，通常分为：
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"早期、中期、晚期","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"前驱期、出疹期、恢复期","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"初期、极期、恢复期","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"体温上升期、极期、体温下降期","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"潜伏期、前驱期、症状明显期、恢复期","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 传染病检疫期限的确定是依据该病的：
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"隔离期","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"最长潜伏期","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"传染期","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"最短潜伏期","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"平均潜伏期","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 初发传染病已转入恢复期，而初发病的症状再度出现，称为
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"再燃","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"复发","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"再感染","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"混合感染","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"二重感染","IsAnswer":false}]
